meta_title: What Is Maintenance Administration? Definition & Key Role
meta_description: Maintenance administration is the governance of workflows, data, and resources to ensure asset reliability. Explore its role in CMMS and operational efficiency.
title: What Is Maintenance Administration?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Is Maintenance Administration?

image_prompt: A high-tech industrial control room where a diverse team of maintenance managers in professional PPE (reflective vests and hard hats) reviews real-time asset performance data on large, sleek digital displays and tablets. The setting is a modern, clean manufacturing facility with advanced machinery visible through a glass partition in the background. Photo-realistic, cinematic lighting, 8k resolution.
